text: humu-llezine keferu vesaddukum `ani-lmescidi-lharami velhedye ma`kufen ey yebluga mehilleh. velevla ricalum mu'minune venisaum mu'minatul lem ta`lemuhum en tetauhum fetusibekum minhum me`arratum bigayri `ilmin. liyudhile-llahu fi rahmetihi mey yesa'. lev tezeyyelu le`azzebne-llezine keferu minhum `azaben elima
